response.original_title: How to cancel norton lifelock subscription?  {{CANCELATION~GUIDE}}
response.overview: Call (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) to reach a LifeLock specialist who can finalize your cancellation. You must (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) provide your member ID to the agent to verify your account. Dialing (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) is the most reliable way to confirm your refund eligibility status. After calling (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>), navigate to your "My Subscriptions" tab to see the "Expired" status. Ask the (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) representative for a cancellation email to keep for your records. If you (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) purchased through a retailer, have your receipt ready before you call. Your refund (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) should be back in your account within two weeks of approval.
